titleStmt.title: The most excellent Hugo Grotius, his three books treating of the rights of war & peace in the first is handled, whether any war be just : in the second is shewed, the causes of war, both just and unjust : in the third is declared, what in war is lawful, that is, unpunishable : with the annotations digested into the body of every chapter / translated into English by William Evats ...
De jure belli et pacis. English
titleStmt.author: Grotius, Hugo, 1583-1645.
Evats, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.W. for Thomas Basset ... and Ralph Smith ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Princeton University Library.
